# The `IndexListEntry` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class represents an entry in the slot index list held in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindexes">SlotIndexes</a> pass. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

## Description {#details}

This class represents an entry in the slot index list held in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindexes">SlotIndexes</a> pass.

It should not be used directly. See the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> &amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindexes">SlotIndexes</a> classes for the public interface to this information.

Definition at line 46 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/slotindexes-h">SlotIndexes.h</a>.
